title: Windows vista_win7_win8 (June2013) 32bit MemoryLimit 4gb Patcher
description:
Windows vista_win7_win8 (June2013) 32bit MemoryLimit 4gb Patcher - pae2 (old and new kernels)


I put this folder archived into a rar so people can find it here and use
or try it out.

I have succesfully patched a win 7 ult version running entirely of a SD card
with it 16gb and 32gb one.

This is not my work see readme's for where sources are found and if any updates
exist since July 2 2013.

but the autoit installer is the latest from the web site

Should work with vista or windows 7 or windows 8 pro and ulitmate


Make sure to backup or use nortons ghost 15 to backup your drive incase
it kills it somehow.. or test in vmware or sd card.


This is ideal for people who have windows 7 Pro x86 32bit on their HP laptops
and want to access 8gb of memory from a upgrade liek I did
so can access more ram for running vmware 8 on top with other OSes


Enjoy. and HELP SEED.. 


PS..dont blame me if it fails for your setup but
ive used a mem patcher for years now. but this is a new way/method
from the old kernel replacement patch from 2010! also on TPB if search for it
